title: Turtle Wax 50935 Scratch Repair & Renew 7 oz.
description: Turtle Wax Scratch Repair & Renew is a new innovative formula that features our proprietary Heal & Seal technology, with permanent results that will not wash away at your next car washing. Formulated with precision platelets that safely work away scratches, swirls, paint transfer, water spots and more, leaving behind a brilliant shine. Can be applied by hand with a microfiber towel or my machine. Simply place a small amount on towel or bonnet, and work the product into the blemish for 30 seconds. Repeat until desired results are achieved.
